posts.post_content:
I am selling a lot of 54 graded T-205s (mostly SGC with some PSA and one GAI and one BVG) ranging from SGC 10/ PSA 1 to SGC 60.  Highlights are as follows:

HOF

Bender - SGC 40
Bresnahan (Closed Mouth) - SGC 30
Bresnahan (Open Mouth) - SGC 10
Chance - SGC 50
Collins (Open Mouth) - SGC 30
Evers - BVG 2.5
Huggins - SGC 30
Jennings - SGC 40
McGraw - GAI 3.5
Wallace (With Cap) - SGC 40
Wheat - SGC 20

Two cards with Broad Leaf backs.

Six cards that are SGC 60.

I can send a detailed listing of specific cards with grades, back info, etc to any interested parties.  Scans are available at the following link:

[url]http://s437.photobucket.com/albums/qq91/OriginalTrekkerMike/Graded%20T-205s%20For%20Sale/[/url]

Please note that I am NOT looking to break this lot up.  I am looking for offers on the entire lot.  I have a minimum price in mind and I will sell to the first individual to email or PM me with an offer that matches or exceeds that price.  The agreed upon price will include all shipping and handling charges.
